argument.name: blob_data
argument.description: A blob variable with data that you wish to write into .

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of times to write Blob_Data.

page.description: Fill a blob with replicated data from another blob.
page.discussion: The .REPLICATE() method initializes and writes Blob_Data Count times.
page.example: dim b1 as B dim b2 as B b2 = char_to_blob("d") b1.replicate(b2, 4) ? b1 = dddd
